metadata.title: CVE-2007-5109 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in index.php in FlatNuke2.6, and possibly 3, allows remote attackers to change the password andprivilege level of arbitrary accounts via the user parameter and modified(1) regpass and (2) level parameters in a none_Login action, asdemonstrated by using a Flash object to automatically make the request.

criterions.comment: flatnuke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
